publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6454 Tricia Marwick: Congratulations Jake Laingâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Jake Laing, a primary seven pupil at Balcurvie Primary School in Windygates, on his success at the Robert Burns World Federation National Festival; notes that Jake, who plays the accordion, came first in the P6/P7 instrumental category and was overall primary winner of all four disciplines, which made him Scottish Junior Burnsian; applauds Jake on his achievements and for his musical talent, and praises Balcurvie Primary School for encouraging its pupils to participate in and learn about Scottish culture.

S3M-6454 Congratulations Jake Laing (lodged on 1 June 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*, Claire Baker*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ted Brocklebank*
